title: OWIN Women's Adjustable Spaghetti Straps Sleeveless High Waist Split Midi Bodycon Cocktail Party Dress
description: HIGH QUALITY & COMFY FABRICS: Made of high quality polyester skin-touch soft fabric make you lightweight and breathable to wear. The women split dress is lined so it won't be seen-through. It's the perfect party dress that every woman needs in her closet! Excellent quality. Gorgeous look and very comfortable!

SPECIAL DESIGN FOR PARTY DRESSES: Spaghetti adjustable straps/sleeveless/asymmetrical neckline/side slit/midi length/invisible back zip/high waist/soft fabric/lined/solid color/cocktail dress/party dress/formal dress/wedding guest dress/new year dress. Adjustable spaghetti strap and asymmetrical neckline show off your pretty collarbones. One side slit midi dress, showing body curves.

ELEGANT SLIT MIDI DRESS WITH- Great quality, flattering, women's cocktail party dresses. Perfect match with your favorite high heel shoes, easy go with jewelry, fashion bag.You can match with your favorite jackets, cardigan and coat in fall and winter. This women bodycon midi dress is perfect for your formal event needs. Just add heels, jewelry and a clutch to stand out from the crowd!

PERFECT FOR ANY OCCASION: This spaghetti straps dress is so elegant and simple that it’s perfect for so many occasions! Such as cocktail, party, club wear, night out, special events, graduation ceremony, homecoming, wedding guest, prom, daily wear, school, vacation, date night, office, evening, dance performances, casual, honeymoon, beach, holiday, dinner, shopping, work, birthday, bridal shower cruise or any other formal occasions. It is also a great gift for family and friends.

CARE FOR WOMENS COCKTAIL DRESS: For the dress is vacuum packed,it may be a little wrinkled when you receive it.Please no worry about it,It can be easily flattened by a garment steamer. Machine Wash In Laundry Bag/ Hand Wash In Gentle Cold Water/ Color Separated Washing/ Do Not Bleach.
